desc: Blue Wonder™ cloths are great for every room or surface in your house. The microfiber cleaning cloths are made from a superior patented blend of high quality nylon and polyester. The Classic cloth is an all purpose cleaning cloth and the Deluxe cloth is perfect for all your delicate cleaning needs. Made in Canada.

layout.text: Blue Wonder™ Microfiber Cleaning Cloths for Every Room and Surface in Your Home
